articles.description: Shilpa Shetty Kundra, her sister Shamita Shetty and their mother Sunanda Shetty have been summoned by Andheri magistrate court. A businessman has accused them of not repaying a loan of Rs 21 lakh, which was allegedly taken by Shilpa's father Surendra Shetty.
